class.name: ctu_cras_norlab_lily_sensor_config_1/LogicalContactBridge
class.description: Nodelet for converting Ignition Gazebo logical contact messages to ctu_cras_norlab_lily_sensor_config_1/LogicalContact.

class.name: ctu_cras_norlab_lily_sensor_config_1/FootContactBridge
class.description: Nodelet for converting Ignition Gazebo foot contact messages to ctu_cras_norlab_lily_sensor_config_1/ContactsStamped.
